alert.note: Alert for Stoddard; Wayne (Missouri) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Paducah (Southern Illinois and Indiana, Southeastern Missouri and Western Kentucky)
info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued July 27 at 7:41PM CDT until July 27 at 8:30PM CDT by NWS Paducah
info.description: The National Weather Service in Paducah has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... Southeastern Wayne County in southeastern Missouri... West central Stoddard County in southeastern Missouri... * Until 830 PM CDT. * At 741 PM CDT, a severe thunderstorm was located near Puxico, or 7 miles east of Lake Wappapello State Park, moving southeast at 25 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts and nickel size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Expect damage to roofs, siding, and trees. * This severe thunderstorm will be near... Puxico around 750 PM CDT. Other locations in the path of this severe thunderstorm include Bloomfield. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...0.88 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
